cards.name: FX-550 Skygrasper
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Beam Cannon; 1 Nose Vulcans; 1 Armored Hull.
wargear: This unit may take 1 [Striker Pack] unit.

wargear.name: Beam Cannon
wargear.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, attacks from this weapon score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

abilities.name: Striker Pack
abilities.description: If you have upgraded this model to have a [Striker Pack] unit, attach the appropriate [Striker Pack] unit to this model as a reminder. These do not count as models for any rules purposes.  Increase the base cost of this model by the cost of that unit.

other.name: Bombing Run
other.description: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 3+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: Linear Gun Tank
cards.loadout: Every model is equipped with: 1 Linear Cannon; 1 Armored Tracks.

other.name: Mobile Hunter-Killers
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Avenging Protector
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent‚Äôs Shooting phase, when a friendly ORB WALKER unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, this unit can use this ability. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, this unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

abilities.name: Slippery
abilities.description: In your Charge phase, this model may make a Normal move instead of declaring a charge.

abilities.name: SEED Activated
abilities.description: Once per game, this model may re-roll a charge roll.  Once per game, at any time, this model may gain the [Fights First] keyword until the end of the phase.

abilities.name: Neutron Jammer Canceller Phase Shift
abilities.description: This model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against ranged attacks.

abilities.name: HiMAT Mode
abilities.description: You can target this model with the Tank Shock Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
